docs.lead_paragraph: Under the plan, companies that received two rounds of federal bailouts would submit major executive pay changes for approval by a new federal monitor.

headline.seo: Treasury Plans Wider Oversight on Compensation
headline.main: U.S. to Propose Wider Oversight of Compensation
headline.sub: New Official to Monitor Companies Twice Aided by Bailout ;
headline.print_headline: Treasury Plans Wider Oversight Of Compensation

docs.snippet: Under the plan, companies that received two rounds of federal bailouts would submit major executive pay changes for approval by a new federal monitor.

byline.original: By LOUISE STORY and ERIC DASH

docs.lead_paragraph: Senators Max Baucus, Democrat of Montana, and Charles E. Grassley, Republican of Iowa, insist they can overcome 70 years of precedent on health legislation.

headline.main: Bipartisan Health Bill Is Possible, Leaders Say
headline.print_headline: Bipartisan Health Bill Is Possible, Leaders Say

docs.snippet: Senators Max Baucus, Democrat of Montana, and Charles E. Grassley, Republican of Iowa, insist they can overcome 70 years of precedent on health legislation.
